What are some benefits of regular physical exercise for individuals of all ages and health conditions? Can you provide examples of how exercise can improve cardiovascular health, muscle strength, immune function, mood regulation, cognitive function, and sleep quality? Please include relevant evidence from empirical studies and medical research to support your claims.
Additionally, can you provide a C# code example of a program that tracks an individual's exercise routine and provides personalized recommendations based on their fitness goals and progress?
